title: Ticket #332: MAC address specifications for VM jobs does not work
description: When users create VM universe jobs, they cannot specify MAC addresses for those jobs because of a bug in Condor. I have created a patch to correct this.
remarks:
2009-Mar-19 11:59:57 by matt:
The patch wasn't against a current V7_2-branch, but was simple enough to adapt. It has been committed.

commit baca3df68361244fdfd0b6aceeab2c556944633c Author: Benjamin Kreuter <bkreuter@redhat.com> Commit: Matthew Farrellee <matt@redhat.com> 

    Fixed vm_macaddr parsing by condor_submit, %s -> "%s"


    VERSION HISTORY: Resolved bug where vm_macaddr was improperly parsed, and th
us ignored, by condor_submit for jobs in the VM Universe.
attachments: • macfix.patch 474 bytes added by bkreuter on 2009-Mar-19 14:10:38 UTC.
creator: bkreuter
